mapper.select: SELECT cr.chatroom_no as "chatroom.chatroomNo", cr.create_at as "chatroom.createAt", cr.user_no as "chatroom.userNo", cr.gosu_no as "chatroom.gosuNo", M.user_name as "userName", M.USER_PROFILE as "userProfile" FROM CHATROOM cr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NAME, USER_NO, USER_PROFILE FROM MEMBER ) M ON CR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE cr.user_no = #{userNo} OR GOSU_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_NO, CONTENT, SENDER, TYPE, CHATROOM_NO) VALUES (SEQ_CHAT_NO.nextval, #{content}, #{sender}, #{type}, #{chatroomNo})

INSERT INTO ESTIMATE (EST_NO, EST_TITLE, EST_CONTENT, EST_ADDRESS, EST_SERVICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CONFIRMATION_DATE, EST_PRICE, STATUS, "tid", GOSU_NO, USER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_ESTIMATE_NO.nextval, "", #{estContent}, #{estAddress}, #{estService}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} , #{confirmationDate}, #{estPrice}, 1, NULL, gosuNo, userNo)
